item.description:
This snowstorm is the worst anybody can remember. One can barely see one's hand in front of one's face when stepping outside! A few luckless souls tend to disappear when a blizzard like this one rolls in. Some villagers just brought one poor drifter in, and it looks like he's been frozen since things began days ago- and somebody swears up and down that they saw him outside earlier today! Is there some strange magic at work? Was it a ghost that was seen... or was it something more sinister? Come join us for a night of Dungeons & Dragons (and other games as well), take on the role of a fantasy hero, and solve the mystery!

Ages 6-10 play from 6:30-8:30 PM; ages 11+ play until 9:30. Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember. At the door: $20/member, $25/nonmember.
item.name: Dungeons & Dragons Night: Cold Reflection
